title: Voyeur Dead, Day One.
description: Warning! If you frighten easily, have night terrors, or if you have a heart condition, think very carefully before you read or view Voyeur Dead. You've been warned! Witness the end of the world though the eyes of a voyeur in this photographic journal of a sexual predator finding himself face to camera with the walking dead. Now predator is prey. The voyeur must look to his victims for salvation.
author: Alan Gandy
